branding.tagline: Immerse in the paradox of reality and fantasy

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Work that combines magical realism and psychological exploration
publishing_focus.target_audience: Mature readers interested in literary exploration of the human mind
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: We excel in books that delve deep into the human psyche within a fantastical framework
publishing_focus.example_titles: Comparable to works by Haruki Murakami or Mark Z. Danielewski
